name: 𝐌𝐀𝐑𝐈𝐎𝐍 𝐗
description: 𝐌𝐀𝐑𝐈𝐎𝐍 𝐗, the best WhatsApp Bot

SESSION_ID.description: Enter your 𝐌𝐀𝐑𝐈𝐎𝐍 𝐗 session id here

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter exactly the same app name you've entered above.

MODE.description: Set 'private' to enable private mode, 'public' to enable public mode, 'group' to enable only group and 'pm' to enable only private chats

ANTIDELETE.description: Set 'private' to send deleted messages to message yourself, 'chat' to current chat and 'off' to disable'

ANTI_EDIT.description: Set 'private' to send edited messages to message yourself, 'chat' to current chat and 'off' to disable'

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Set true to make the bot online 24/7 or set false to disable always online'

AUTO_STATUS_VIEW.description: Set true to enable and false to disable auto status view

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Set true to enable and false to disable auto status react

STATUS_EMOJI.description: Set your desired status reaction emoji

CHATBOT.description: Set true to enable and false to disable auto reply chatbot

ANTI_CALL.description: Set true to enable and false to disable anti-call feature

WELCOME_MSG.description: Set true to enable and false to disable welcome messages

TIMEZONE.description: Enter your timezone here. Google or don't edit if you don't know!

SUDO.description: Type additional allowed users here. They'll be able to use all the functions of the bot without restrictions. Separate with comma incase of more than one number.

AUTO_READ.description: Set true to enable automatic reading of messages
